verses.verse: בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et At that time הַהִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD; וְיֹצִיאוּ ve-yo-tzi-'u כיֹוצִ֣יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tzi-'u after קאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַצְמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> atz-Mot the bones מַלְכֵֽי־ <S%H4428><s%> mal-chei- of the kings יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַצְמוֹת־ <S%H6106><s%> 'atz-mot- and the bones שָׂרָיו֩ <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rav of his princes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַצְמ֨וֹת <S%H6106><s%> atz-Mot and the bones הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְאֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַצְמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> atz-Mot and the bones הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im, of the prophets וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַצְמ֥וֹת <S%H6106><s%> atz-Mot and the bones יוֹשְׁבֵֽי־ <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-vei- of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem מִקִּבְרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6913><s%> mik-kiv-rei-Hem. out of their graves

וּשְׁטָחוּם֩ <S%H7849><s%> u-she-ta-Chum And they shall spread לַשֶּׁ֨מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> lash-She-mesh them before the sun וְלַיָּרֵ֜חַ <S%H3394><s%> ve-lai-ya-Re-ach and the moon וּלְכֹ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-Chol all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va and all the host הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of heaven אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֲהֵב֜וּם <S%H157><s%> 'a-he-Vum whom they have loved וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and which עֲבָדוּם֙ <S%H5647><s%> 'a-va-Dum and whom they have served וַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and which הָלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-le-Chu whom they have walked אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem, and after וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and which דְּרָשׁ֔וּם <S%H1875><s%> de-ra-Shum, and whom they have sought וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and which הִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> hish-ta-cha-Vu and whom they have worshipped לָהֶ֑ם <S%H99999><s%> la-Hem; לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> ye-'a-se-Fu they shall not be gathered וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or יִקָּבֵ֔רוּ <S%H6912><s%> yik-ka-Ve-ru, nor be buried לְדֹ֛מֶן <S%H1828><s%> le-Do-men they shall be for dung עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon the face הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah of the earth יִֽהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> Yih-Yu. become

וְנִבְחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> ve-niv-Char shall be chosen מָ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> ma-vet And death מֵֽחַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> me-chai-Yim, rather than life לְכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol, all הַשְּׁאֵרִית֙ <S%H7611><s%> hash-she-'e-Rit by all the residue הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֔ים <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'a-Rim, of them that remain מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- rather הַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֥ה <S%H4940><s%> ham-mish-pa-Chah family הָֽרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah of this evil הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot; in בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הַמְּקֹמ֤וֹת <S%H4725><s%> ham-me-ko-Mot in all the places הַנִּשְׁאָרִים֙ <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'a-Rim which remain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to which הִדַּחְתִּ֣ים <S%H5080><s%> hid-dach-Tim whither I have driven שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, them נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um them saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot. of hosts ס sa-Mek

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta Moreover thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD הֲיִפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> ha-yip-pe-Lu Shall they fall וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and not יָק֑וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> ya-Ku-mu; and not arise אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo יָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv ;shall he turn away וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv. and not return

מַדּ֨וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' Why שׁוֹבְבָ֜ה <S%H7725><s%> shov-Vah slidden back הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am Why [then] is this people הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh has this יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem מְשֻׁבָ֣ה <S%H4878><s%> me-shu-Vah backsliding נִצַּ֑חַת <S%H5331><s%> nitz-Tza-chat; alway הֶחֱזִ֙יקוּ֙ <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zi-ku fast בַּתַּרְמִ֔ית <S%H8649><s%> bat-tar-Mit, fast deceit מֵאֲנ֖וּ <S%H3985><s%> me-'a-Nu they refuse לָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> la-Shuv. to return

הִקְשַׁ֤בְתִּי <S%H7181><s%> hik-Shav-ti I hearkened וָֽאֶשְׁמָע֙ <S%H8085><s%> va-'esh-Ma' and heard לוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> chen after that יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Be-ru, [but] they spake not aright אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein No אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, no man נִחָם֙ <S%H5162><s%> ni-Cham repented עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- him of רָ֣עָת֔וֹ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'a-To, his wickedness לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> meh What עָשִׂ֑יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti; What have I done כֻּלֹּ֗ה <S%H3605><s%> kul-Loh, all manner שָׁ֚ב <S%H7725><s%> v ;every one turned; בִּמְרֻצֹותָם bim-ru-tzo-tam כבִּמְר֣וּצָתָ֔ם <S%H4794><s%> bim-Ru-tza-Tam, course קכְּס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> ke-Sus as the horse שׁוֹטֵ֖ף <S%H7857><s%> sho-Tef rusheth בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> bam-mil-cha-Mah. into the battle

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Even חֲסִידָ֣ה <S%H2624><s%> cha-si-Dah Yea the stork בַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> vash-sha-Ma-yim, in the heaven יָֽדְעָה֙ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'Ah knoweth מֽוֹעֲדֶ֔יהָ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'a-Dei-ha, her appointed times וְתֹ֤ר <S%H8449><s%> ve-Tor and the turtle; וְסוּס ve-sus כוְסִיס֙ <S%H5483><s%> ve-Sis crane קוְעָג֔וּר <S%H5693><s%> ve-'a-Gur, and the swallow שָׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> sha-me-Ru observe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et the time בֹּאָ֑נָה <S%H935><s%> bo-'A-nah; of their coming וְעַמִּ֕י <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am-Mi but my people לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U, know אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat not the judgment יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

אֵיכָ֤ה <S%H349><s%> 'ei-Chah how תֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> to-me-Ru How do ye say חֲכָמִ֣ים <S%H2450><s%> cha-cha-Mim We [are] wise אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu, we וְתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> ve-to-Rat and the law יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אִתָּ֑נוּ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ta-nu; for אָכֵן֙ <S%H403><s%> 'a-Chen [is] with us;Lo certainly הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold לַשֶּׁ֣קֶר <S%H8267><s%> lash-She-ker in vain עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, made עֵ֖ט <S%H5842><s%> 'et he [it] the pen שֶׁ֥קֶר <S%H8267><s%> She-ker [is] in vain סֹפְרִֽים׃ <S%H5608><s%> so-fe-Rim. of the scribes

הֹבִ֣ישׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ho-Vi-shu are put חֲכָמִ֔ים <S%H2450><s%> cha-cha-Mim, The wise חַ֖תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> Chat-tu they are dismayed וַיִּלָּכֵ֑דוּ <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-la-Che-du; and taken הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold בִדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> vid-var- the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD מָאָ֔סוּ <S%H3988><s%> ma-'A-su, lo they have rejected וְחָכְמַֽת־ <S%H2451><s%> ve-cha-che-mat- and what wisdom מֶ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> meh and what לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem. ס sa-Mek

לָכֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore אֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten Therefore will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נְשֵׁיהֶ֜ם <S%H802><s%> ne-shei-Hem their wives לַאֲחֵרִ֗ים <S%H312><s%> la-'a-che-Rim, unto others שְׂדֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H7704><s%> se-do-tei-Hem [and] their fields לְי֣וֹרְשִׁ֔ים <S%H3423><s%> le-Yor-Shim, to them that shall inherit כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because מִקָּטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> mik-ka-Ton [them] for every one from the least וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- even גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, even unto the greatest כֻּלֹּ֖ה <S%H3605><s%> kul-Loh Everyone בֹּצֵ֣עַ <S%H1214><s%> bo-Tze-a' is given בָּ֑צַע <S%H1215><s%> Ba-tza'; to covetousness מִנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> min-na-Vi from the prophet וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- even כֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> ko-Hen, even unto the priest כֻּלֹּ֖ה <S%H3605><s%> kul-Loh Everyone עֹ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'O-seh every one dealeth שָּֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker. falsely

וַיְרַפּ֞וּ <S%H7495><s%> vay-rap-Pu For they have healed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֶׁ֤בֶר <S%H7667><s%> She-ver the hurt בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- of the daughter עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi of my people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and נְקַלָּ֔ה <S%H7043><s%> ne-kal-Lah, slightly לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying שָׁל֣וֹם׀ <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom Peace שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom; peace וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein is no שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom. when [there is] no peace

הֹבִ֕שׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> ho-Vi-shu Were they ashamed כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki because תוֹעֵבָ֖ה <S%H8441><s%> to-'e-Vah of the abomination עָשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su; when they had committed גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- were they בּ֣וֹשׁ <S%H954><s%> Boosh ashamed לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- were not יֵבֹ֗שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu, ashamed וְהִכָּלֵם֙ <S%H3637><s%> ve-hik-ka-Lem they blush לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not יָדָ֔עוּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da-'u, neither could לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore יִפְּל֣וּ <S%H5307><s%> yip-pe-Lu therefore shall they fall בַנֹּפְלִ֗ים <S%H5307><s%> van-no-fe-Lim, among them that fall בְּעֵ֧ת <S%H6256><s%> be-'Et in the time פְּקֻדָּתָ֛ם <S%H6486><s%> pe-kud-da-Tam of their visitation יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <S%H3782><s%> yik-ka-she-Lu they shall be cast down אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

אָסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> 'a-Sof I will surely אֲסִיפֵ֖ם <S%H5486><s%> 'a-si-Fem consume נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- them saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; God אֵין֩ <S%H369><s%> 'ein There עֲנָבִ֨ים <S%H6025><s%> 'a-na-Vim [there shall be] no grapes בַּגֶּ֜פֶן <S%H1612><s%> bag-Ge-fen on the vine וְאֵ֧ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein will be no תְּאֵנִ֣ים <S%H8384><s%> te-'e-Nim nor figs בַּתְּאֵנָ֗ה <S%H8384><s%> bat-te-'e-Nah, on the fig tree וְהֶֽעָלֶה֙ <S%H5929><s%> ve-he-'a-Leh and the leaf נָבֵ֔ל <S%H5034><s%> na-Vel, shall fade וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-Ten and [the things that] I have given לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem them יַעַבְרֽוּם׃ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'av-Rum. them shall pass away
